name: Alchemy Workshop
description:
Refill stock, refine material, brew potion, get rich!

Alchemy Workshop is a fast-pace shop management simulator. Control your fairy triplets and get ready for a busy day.

=====================================

Controls:

Left Click :Select a fairy.

Right Click :Assign a task.
